nodes.text: Drearia was an astronomical object located in the regions known as the Inner Rim and the Interior. It was also situated in the grid square L-8 of the Standard Galactic Grid, and the super-hyperroute known as the Hydian Way linked Drear to the Paqualis system as well as the world Champala. Drearia shared its name with the company Drearian Defense Conglomerate.

Drearia was introduced in the current Star Wars canon in the fifty-second issue of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around December 30, 2015. The world Drearia was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
